backend/main.mo: Defines types for song submissions, artist profiles, verification requests, and related metadata in the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records linking frontend files to feature requirements, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides pre-written summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Explains deployment failures, fixes, restored features, and verification steps for the frontend configuration system.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file setting metadata, favicon, and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication, actor loading, and conditional profile setup modal within the main app layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminAnnouncemen: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/AdminArtistManag: Admin UI for searching, viewing, and editing artist profiles with filtering and edit dialog support.
frontend/src/components/AdminBlogManagem: Empty file intended for future admin blog management features.
frontend/src/components/AdminEditArtistD: Dialog for admins to edit artist profiles, including text fields and profile photo upload with progress.
frontend/src/components/AdminSubmissions: Admin UI to view, edit, approve, reject, or delete song submissions with file download support.
frontend/src/components/AdminTeamManagem: Manages team invite codes, allowing generation, viewing unused codes, and copying invite links.
frontend/src/components/AlbumTracksEdito: Editor for managing album tracks, including metadata fields and audio file uploads with progress.
Form for creating or editing an artist profile with photo upload, social links, and profile restrictions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer showing copyright and support email link.
frontend/src/components/GreenBadge.tsx: Displays a green badge image with a tooltip indicating an artist badge.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with theme toggle, auth handling, and optional artist profile display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal collecting a user's name and submitting a profile setup request.
frontend/src/components/SongSubmissionFo: Complex form for submitting songs or albums with validation, file uploads, and metadata fields.
frontend/src/components/UserArtistProfil: UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting user artist profiles.
frontend/src/components/UserSubmissionsL: Displays user's song submissions with status badges and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for song submissions, admin actions, and artist profile management with toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity, and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard with tabs for managing artist profiles and song submissions, including an admin access check.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with login flow and redirect logic based on admin status, plus feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard with tabs for managing profiles, submitting songs, and viewing submissions.
Downloads an ExternalBlob by converting its bytes into a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File or Blob into an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/isValidUrl.ts: Simple URL validator checking for HTTP/HTTPS prefixes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing admin-login issues, existing frontend fix features, and a request to restore admin privileges for a specific user.
